edu.uiuc.ncsa.security.util.jwk.JSONWebKeys

    Package Description
    edu.uiuc.ncsa.security.util.jwk
    Support for JSON web keys.

      Read a set of keys from a file.

      static JSONWebKeys JSONWebKeyUtil.fromJSON​(net.sf.json.JSON json)
      Takes either a standard JSON object of keys: {"keys":[...]} or a single key and turns it in a set of web keys

      static void JSONWebKeyUtil.toXML​(JSONWebKeys jwks, XMLStreamWriter xsw)
